title: Grace Beside Me
overview: Fuzzy Mac's life is turned upside down on her 13th birthday, when she discovers she can communicate with spirits! It's hard enough navigating the highs and lows of becoming a teenager while living with your eccentric Nan and Pop. Throw in a host of needy spirits, mischievous totems and spooky ancestors, and you have a recipe for a whole bunch of trouble! Follow Fuzzy Mac as she learns to accept her gift and understand the meaning of 'grace'.
